text.name: ui_RVB_gameplaysetting_dailyOperatingTimeDesc
text.text: How often should maintenance be done per day. This feature is currently inactive.

text.name: ui_RVB_gameplaysetting_repaironlyDesc
text.text: A vehicle can only be repaired or serviced in a vehicle workshop.

text.name: ui_RVB_gameplaysetting_workshopCloseDesc
text.text: The vehicle workshop closes at that time

text.name: ui_RVB_generalsetting_alertMessageDesc
text.text: If your vehicle is damaged, serviced or repaired, a warning message will appear in the middle of the screen if you are in the vehicle.

text.name: RVB_WorkShopClose
text.text: Vehicle workshop is closed, come back at %s o'clock.

text.name: RVB_inspectionDialog
text.text: Are you sure you can inspect this vehicle for %s cost?

text.name: RVB_inspectionTimeDialog
text.text: Vehicle inspection will be completed at %s.

text.name: RVB_inspectionDayDialog
text.text: Vehicle inspection will be completed tomorrow at %s.

text.name: RVB_repairTimeDialog
text.text: Vehicle repair will be completed at %s.

text.name: RVB_repairDayDialog
text.text: Vehicle repair will be completed tomorrow at %s.

text.name: RVB_periodicserviceDialog
text.text: Are you sure you want to service the vehicle for %s cost?

text.name: RVB_periodicserviceTimeDialog
text.text: Vehicle serviced will be completed at %s.

text.name: RVB_periodicserviceDayDialog
text.text: Vehicle serviced will be completed tomorrow at %s.

text.name: RVB_batteryChDialog
text.text: Are you sure you want to charge your vehicle battery for %s cost?

text.name: RVB_batteryChTimeDialog
text.text: Vehicle battery charging will be completed at %s.

text.name: RVB_batteryChDayDialog
text.text: Vehicle battery charging will be completed tomorrow at %s.

text.name: RVB_alertmessage_batteryCh_hud
text.text: %s vehicle battery charging is in progress.

text.name: RVB_fault_
text.text: Do not drive too fast, the engine is still cold.

text.name: RVB_fault_hud
text.text: %s the vehicle is driven too fast, the engine is still cold.

text.name: RVB_fault_thermostatC
text.text: A motor nem éri el az üzemi hőmérsékletet.

text.name: RVB_fault_thermostatC_hud
text.text: %s motorja nem éri el az üzemi hőmérsékletet.

text.name: RVB_main_repair_fault
text.text: The mechanic cannot repair this vehicle, visit "RVB" Service.

text.name: popupMessage_battery_timeScaleup
text.text: Szerelő: Ne kapcsolgasd ki-be az akkumulátor töltőt, mert tovább fog tartani a töltés.

text.name: popupMessage_battery_timeScaledown
text.text: Szerelő: Hagyd már békén a töltőt.

text.name: VehicleBreakdown_DEAD_GENERATOR
text.text: The engine does not start, the generator has failed.

text.name: VehicleBreakdown_DEAD_ENGINE_INSPECTION
text.text: Vehicle cannot be started, inspected is in progress.

text.name: VehicleBreakdown_DEAD_ENGINE_REPAIR
text.text: Vehicle cannot be started, repaired is in progress.

text.name: VehicleBreakdown_DEAD_ENGINE_SERVICE
text.text: Vehicle cannot be started, serviced is in progress.

text.name: VehicleBreakdown_DEAD_ENGINE_SUSPENSION
text.text: The vehicle key is with the mechanic, who is currently resting.

text.name: VehicleBreakdown_DEAD_ENGINE_BATTERY
text.text: Engine does not start, battery is dead.

text.name: VehicleBreakdown_DEAD_ENGINE_BATTERY_CHARGING
text.text: Vehicle cannot be started, battery charging is in progress.
